Define Documentation

#define Ob ( x   )     ((unsigned)Ob_(0 ## x ## uL))

Referenced by Print_counter().

#define Ob_ ( x   ) 

Value:

((x & 1) | (x >> 2 & 2) | (x >> 4 & 4) | (x >> 6 & 8) |                \
          (x >> 8 & 16) | (x >> 10 & 32) | (x >> 12 & 64) | (x >> 14 & 128))
